text: obaṭa yamkisi hon̆dak siddha vuvahot (eya) ovunṭa kaṇagāṭuva gena dennēya. obaṭa yamkisi napurak sidu vuvahot nam, ē venuven ovun satuṭaṭa pat vannāha. ebævin oba ivasīmen yutuva bhaya bhaktiyen siṭiyahot ovungē kumantraṇaya obaṭa kisima hāniyak æti karannē næta. (mandayat) niyata vaśayenma allāh ovungē kriyāvan vaṭa karagena siṭinnēya
